faqs.question: Why is Miramar attracting so many corporate headquarters, and how does that affect electrical needs?
faqs.answer: Miramar's I-75 corridor has become a major corporate hub—Spirit Airlines, Carnival, and numerous tech companies have headquarters here. This growth means more work-from-home professionals who need dedicated home office circuits, robust internet infrastructure support, and backup power capabilities. We're helping many Miramar homeowners upgrade their electrical systems to handle the demands of remote work and high-speed networking.

faqs.question: Can you install a backup generator for our Miramar home before hurricane season?
faqs.answer: Yes, and we recommend booking generator installations well before June 1st. Miramar sees high demand for generators after hurricane threats, and by then it's often too late to get equipment and schedule installation. A whole-home standby generator with automatic transfer switch means your power comes back within seconds of an outage—no extension cords, no gas cans, no waiting.
